""Did you see the way he threw down Hal; like he was no bigger than Rickon"

"They were northern birds.  They are coming; Catelyn thought.  "They're coming; my lady;" Hal"
"at a trot; leading his men downhill.  Catelyn sat on her horse; unmoving; with Hal"
